entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:39 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to rain or snow near noon. Local snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 9. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 4.
